name: Video
description: Given a URL, display a video

source.label: Video URL
source.description: The URL the video should load

resizeMode.label: Resize Mode
resizeMode.description: How the video should be scaled for display. (Default: stretch)

positionMillis.label: Starting Point
positionMillis.description: Set a certian starting point of the video

rate.label: Playback Rate
rate.description: The playback rate of the media. This value must be between 0.0 and 32.0 (Default: 1)

volume.label: Volume
volume.description: The volume of the audio for this media. This value must be between 0.0 (silence) and 1.0 (maximum volume). (Default: .5)

isMuted.label: Mute
isMuted.description: To mute the audio of the video.

useNativeControls.label: Use Native Controls
useNativeControls.description: Allow users to have the option to pause or play the video

shouldPlay.label: Play on Load
shouldPlay.description: Allows the video play on loading
